form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Luján (for himself and Mr. Cornyn) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

form.official-title: To reauthorize the program for strengthening communities of recovery for individuals with substance use disorders.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Strengthening Communities of Recovery Act.
Section 547 of the Public Health Service Act (42 U.S.C. 290ee–2) is amended—

paragraph.text: in the section heading, by striking Building and inserting Strengthening;
in subsection (d)(2)(A), in the matter preceding clause (i), by inserting or strengthen after build; and
in subsection (f), by striking $5,000,000 for each of fiscal years 2019 through 2023 and inserting $16,000,000 for each of fiscal years 2025 through 2029.
